abstract: Stocks rise sharply after two days of losses, as some companies report strong quarterly results.
lead_paragraph: Indexes drifted higher in early afternoon trading, but energy stocks were among the biggest decliners as oil prices extended their slide.
snippet: Indexes drifted higher in early afternoon trading, but energy stocks were among the biggest decliners as oil prices extended their slide.

headline.main: Strong Corporate Results and Encouraging Economic News Send Stocks Higher
headline.print_headline: Short Losing Streak Ends on Reassuring Earnings
